channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The ‘Mostly Peaceful’ Riots Are Back
item.description: Portland wasn’t alone, as local protesters clashed with local police over the weekend.

item.title: Media Silent On KBJ Attending Anti-ICE Grammys After Inventing ‘Scandals’ About Her Colleagues
